definitions.title: n. pl. seventy
definitions.body: (irreg. pl. of [[שֶׁבַע]] Ges:§ 97 f, R. 1);—not decl.:—seventy (oft. as round no., cf. Kö:Hast DB NUMBER, 568 a):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: before n.s. year Ge 5:12 +12 t., man Ju Jdg 9:2, Nu 11:25 + 7 t., shekel Nu 7:13 + 11 t., other n. 5 t.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: before n.pl. kings Ju Jdg 1:7, sons Jdg 8:30, Jdg 9:24, 2Ki 10:1, brothers Ju Jdg 9:56, asses Jdg 12:14, palms Ex 15:27, Nu 33:9, males Ezr 8:7, Ezr 8:14.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: n. om. Ex 24:1, Ex 24:9 (man), Nu 7:85 (shekel), cf. Ju Jdg 9:4.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: + unit + n.s. Ju Jdg 8:14; n. om.70 + 7 (times) Ge 4:24, cf, Ezr 2:40 = Ne 7:43 so 2 + 70 Nu 31:38; n. pl. + 70 + 7 Ezr 8:35; 5 years + 70 year Ge 12:4.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: 70 foll. hundreds: 70 year + 5 years Ge 25:7, and (n. om.) 70 + 2 Ezr 2:3, Ezr 2:4 = Ne 7:8, Ne 7:9, Ne 11:19; + 3 Ezr 2:36, Ne 7:39; 5 + 70 Ezr 2:5).
